products.name: Nature Growth Tee
products.description: Forest green with growth symbolism, crafted for the resilient.
products.longDescription: Forged from the earth's own resilience, the Nature Growth Tee is an armor of 240 GSM heavyweight cotton. Its garment-dyed, forest green fabric tells a story of survival, with a screen-printed graphic that finds beauty in the cracks. This isn't just clothing; it's a declaration that you've endured, adapted, and grown stronger. Made for a relaxed, oversized fit that’s as unapologetic as you are.

products.name: Mythology Ramayana Tee
products.description: Bold red with epic storytelling, a tribute to timeless legends.
products.longDescription: The Ramayana Tee is a canvas for epic tales, printed on a bold, blood-red fabric. It captures the spirit of rebellion and righteousness, designed for those who write their own myths. This piece is a conversation starter, a symbol of your own legendary journey, crafted with the same premium quality and relaxed fit that defines Blckorack.

products.name: Nostalgia Glitch Tee
products.description: Faded black with memories of a distorted past.
products.longDescription: The Nostalgia Glitch Tee is a tribute to the imperfect, fragmented memories that shape us. A faded black base serves as the backdrop for a glitched graphic, representing the beautiful chaos of looking back. It's a wearable piece of art that’s both comfortable and thought-provoking, designed for those who find strength in their personal history.

products.name: Nature Dawn Hoodie
products.description: Earthy tones that rise with the morning sun.
products.longDescription: The Nature Dawn Hoodie blends warmth with symbolism. Made from 300 GSM brushed fleece, it features sun-rise inspired gradient tones. A heavyweight piece that reminds you of new beginnings every time you wear it. Designed for a cozy oversized fit.

products.name: Mythology Krishna Tee
products.description: Divine blue inspired by tales of Krishna.
products.longDescription: The Krishna Tee is dyed in divine blue shades, reflecting stories of compassion and playfulness. Featuring intricate line art prints, this piece blends cultural roots with modern streetwear energy. Perfect for those who embody charisma and courage.

products.name: Nostalgia VHS Tee
products.description: Retro graphics inspired by VHS tapes and old-school memories.
products.longDescription: The VHS Tee takes you back to the static-filled days of cassettes and rewind buttons. Printed on a washed charcoal base, the cracked graphic channels vintage energy. Built with a boxy fit and midweight cotton, it's your wearable time capsule.
